QuestData.Title: Unsafe Passage
QuestData.Description: As we say at the temple: "Never fight a tiger with a hozen on your back."$B$BWe will deal with the sha, but first we must see to the more immediate... nuisance.$B$B<Koro slams the writhing saurok HARD against the stone.>$B$BGroups of refugees from the temple are heading for a camp to the north, but they're being ambushed by saurok. Help me see the next group to the camp and we'll figure out our next move from there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Help Koro Mistwalker escort a group of refugees from the Temple of the Red Crane to Crane Wing Refuge. Speak with Koro first to begin.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $p. We would not have made it without your help.

Objectives.Objective: Accompany Koro to Crane Wing Refuge
